title: Highest pupil-teacher ratio in preprimary education
description: In 2017, Tanzania had the highest pupil-teacher ratio in preprimary education, with 113.97 students per teacher.

title: Highest lower secondary school starting age
description: As of 2023, Tanzania has the highest starting age for lower secondary school at 14 years.

title: Highest bound rate for manufactured products
description: In 2021, Tanzania had the highest bound rate for manufactured products at 120%.

title: Lowest public-private partnership investment in energy
description: In 2020, Tanzania had one of the lowest investments in energy through public-private partnerships, amounting to $1,200,000.

title: Lowest patent applications by nonresidents
description: In 2015, Tanzania had one of the lowest numbers of patent applications by nonresidents, with only 1 application.

title: Lowest change in inventories
description: In 2023, Tanzania experienced one of the lowest changes in inventories, with a decrease of 3,192,498,275,300 in constant local currency units.
